sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_6881eae1db2c33008adbab7dca961948
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:d8dbe096db0c33008adbab7dca96194c</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Compare on Dates</name><order>50</order><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
	   
      return;
   }
if(newValue!=oldValue){
	
	//alert("outside working");
	
		var ga= new GlideAjax("ValidateScheduleTime");
		ga.addParam("sysparm_name","CompareDate");
		
		ga.addParam("sysparm_start_time",g_form.getValue('provisioning_start_time'));
		ga.addParam("sysparm_end_time",g_form.getValue('daily_termination_time'));
		ga.addParam("sysparm_termination_date",g_form.getValue('termination_date'));
		ga.addParam("sysparm_start_date",g_form.getValue('provisioning_start_date')); 
	
		ga.getXML(setSubmit);
	
}
	function setSubmit(response){
		
		var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
	
		if(answer=="inValid"){
			//alert("if working" + answer);
			g_form.addErrorMessage("Provisioning Start date should be less than or equal to Termination Date");	
					
		//	g_form.clearValue('provisioning_start_date');
			g_form.clearValue('termination_date');
					return false;
				}
		//-------------------//	
	}
	}
				/*else if(answer=="notdo"){
					
					alert("Provisioning Start time sould be less than Termination end time ");
					return false;
					
				}*/
				
				
			
	
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-04-01 14:55:14</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>6881eae1db2c33008adbab7dca961948</sys_id><sys_mod_count>18</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Compare on Dates</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="AWS Service Catalog - 1.6.7" source="x_126749_aws_sc">f0b117a3db32320093a7d7a0cf961912</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AWS Service Catalog - 1.6.7">f0b117a3db32320093a7d7a0cf961912</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_6881eae1db2c33008adbab7dca961948</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-04-07 18:47:41</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set display_value="AWS Service Catalog Variables">e5d4a8d0dba90300a5d3ddd0cf961945</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_20591f5ddb9cf3008adbab7dca9619fe
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_126749_aws_sc.ProvisionedProductRepo_V2</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>ProvisionedProductRepo_V2</name><script><![CDATA[var ProvisionedProductRepo_V2 = (function () {

    /**
     * Create an initial record of a provisioned product, with minimal details.
     *
     * @param name {string} Name of the ProvisionedProductDetail to create
     * @param region {string} Region where the product is provisioned
     * @param ownedBy {string} Sys ID of the user that owns the product
     * @param sessionName {string} The name to use for future STS sessions for the product
     *
     * @return {GlideRecord} The GlideRecord object for the saved data
     */
    function createProvisionedProduct(name, region, ownedBy, sessionName) {
        var scp = new GlideRecord('x_126749_aws_sc_cmdb_ci_pp');
        scp.initialize();
        scp.awscreatedtime = new GlideDateTime();
        scp.name = name;
        scp.awsname = name;
        scp.awsregion = region;
        scp.awsstatus = "UNDER_CHANGE";
        scp.awsstssessionname = sessionName;
        scp.owned_by = ownedBy;
        scp.insert();
        return scp;
    }

    /**
     * Update a record of a provisioned product with details from a provisioning event
     * (ProvisionProduct, DescribeRecord, or TerminateProvisionedProduct).
     *
     * @param recordDetail {Object} The RecordDetail object returned by a provisioning event
     * @param ppGR {GlideRecord} The provisioned product GlideRecord to update with values from recordDetail
     * @param awsIdentitySysId {string} The sys_id of the record for the AWS Identity provisioning this product
     * @param productStatus {number} The status (with value from ProvisionedProduct.Status) of this provisioned product
     *
     * @return {GlideRecord} ppGR
     */
    function updateProvisionedProduct(recordDetail, ppGR, awsIdentitySysId, productStatus) {
        ppGR.awsproductid = recordDetail.ProductId;
        ppGR.awsproductstatus = productStatus;
        ppGR.awscreatedtime = Util.toGlideDateTime(recordDetail.CreatedTime);
        ppGR.awsid = recordDetail.ProvisionedProductId;
        ppGR.name = recordDetail.ProvisionedProductName;
        ppGR.awsname = recordDetail.ProvisionedProductName;
        ppGR.awsidentity = awsIdentitySysId;
        ppGR.awstype = recordDetail.ProvisionedProductType;
        ppGR.awsprovisioningartifactid = recordDetail.ProvisioningArtifactId;
        ppGR.update();
        return ppGR;
    }

    /**
     * Sets status and issues a database update
     *
     * @param provisionedProductGR {GlideRecord} Record to update
     * @param productStatus {number} Status to give the record
     * @param [message] {string} Optional error status message
     */
    function updateWithStatus(provisionedProductGR, productStatus, message) {
        provisionedProductGR.awsproductstatus = productStatus;
        if (message) {
            provisionedProductGR.awsstatusmessage = message;
        }
        provisionedProductGR.update();
        return provisionedProductGR;
    }

    /**
     * A utility function to copy details from recordDetail to the pp GlideRecord.
     * Copies only details that are required both for create and update operations,
     * so that this function can avoid code duplication between those operations.
     *
     * @param pp {GlideRecord} GlideRecord of a provisioned product event.
     * @param recordDetail {Object} from an update or similar operation that modifieds the event.
     */
    function copyDetails(pp, recordDetail) {
        pp.awspathid = recordDetail.PathId;
        pp.awsproductid = recordDetail.ProductId;
        pp.awsprovisionedproductid = recordDetail.ProvisionedProductId;
        pp.awsprovisionedproductname = recordDetail.ProvisionedProductName;
        pp.awsprovisionedproducttype = recordDetail.ProvisionedProductType;
        pp.awsprovisioningartifactid = recordDetail.ProvisioningArtifactId;
        pp.awsrecordid = recordDetail.RecordId;
        pp.awsrecordtype = recordDetail.RecordType;
        pp.awsstatus = recordDetail.Status;
        pp.awsupdatedtime = Util.toGlideDateTime(recordDetail.UpdatedTime);
    }

    /**
     * Save an event detail for a provisioned product.
     *
     * @param awsSCProductGR {GlideRecord} GlideRecord of the provisioned product
     * @param recordDetail {Object} RecordDetail from a provisioning request or describeRequest.
     */
    function saveProvisionedProductEvent(awsSCProductGR, recordDetail) {
        var ppEventGR = new GlideRecord('x_126749_aws_sc_pp_event');
        ppEventGR.initialize();
        ppEventGR.awscreatedtime = Util.toGlideDateTime(recordDetail.CreatedTime);
        ppEventGR.awsproduct = awsSCProductGR.sys_id;
		ppEventGR.change_request = CreateChangeRquest();
        copyDetails(ppEventGR, recordDetail);
        ppEventGR.insert();
        return ppEventGR;
    }

    /**
     * Updates an event detail for a provisioned product.
     *
     * @param recordDetail {Object} RecordDetail from an update or similar operation that modifieds the product.
     * @param ppEventGR {GlideRecord} GlideRecord of the provisioned product event
     */
    function updateProvisionedProductEvent(recordDetail, ppEventGR) {
        copyDetails(ppEventGR, recordDetail);
        ppEventGR.update();
        return ppEventGR;
    }

    return {
        createProvisionedProduct: createProvisionedProduct,
        updateProvisionedProduct: updateProvisionedProduct,
        updateWithStatus: updateWithStatus,
        saveProvisionedProductEvent: saveProvisionedProductEvent,
        updateProvisionedProductEvent: updateProvisionedProductEvent
    };
function CreateChangeRquest(){
	
	var change_req= new GlideRecord('change_request');
	change_req.initialize();
	change_req.type = "AWS Provisioned Product Event";
	change_req.short_description="Provision Product Request";
	var change=change_req.insert();

	return change;
}
})();
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-03-19 14:04:53</sys_created_on><sys_id>20591f5ddb9cf3008adbab7dca9619fe</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ProvisionedProductRepo_V2</sys_name><sys_package display_value="AWS Service Catalog - 1.6.7" source="x_126749_aws_sc">f0b117a3db32320093a7d7a0cf961912</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="AWS Service Catalog - 1.6.7">f0b117a3db32320093a7d7a0cf961912</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_20591f5ddb9cf3008adbab7dca9619fe</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-19 14:04:53</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_ef9ee169dba833008adbab7dca961989
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:96a2ae51dbe033008adbab7dca961912</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Validate on  Start Date</name><order>50</order><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		
		return;
	}
	if(newValue!=oldValue){
		
		//alert("outside working");
		
		var ga= new GlideAjax("ValidateScheduleTime");
		ga.addParam("sysparm_name","ValidateStartDate");
		
		ga.addParam("sysparm_start_time",g_form.getValue('provisioning_start_time'));
		ga.addParam("sysparm_end_time",g_form.getValue('daily_termination_time'));
		ga.addParam("sysparm_termination_date",g_form.getValue('termination_date'));
		ga.addParam("sysparm_start_date",g_form.getValue('provisioning_start_date'));
		//------//
		ga.getXML(setSubmit);
		
	}
	function setSubmit(response){
		
		var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		
		// 		if(answer=="samedate"){
			
			// 				g_form.addErrorMessage("Terimnation date should be greater than Today's date");
			
			// 			g_form.clearValue('termination_date');
			// 					return false;
			// 				}
			//---------------------//
			if(answer=="notValid"){
				//	alert("if working");
				g_form.addErrorMessage("Provisioning Start date should be greater than or equal to  Today's date");
				
				g_form.clearValue('provisioning_start_date');
				return false;
			}
		
		
		
			//-------------------//
		}
	}
	/*else if(answer=="notdo"){
		
		alert("Provisioning Start time sould be less than Termination end time ");
		return false;
		
	}*/
	
	
	
	
	]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-04-01 11:12:53</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>ef9ee169dba833008adbab7dca961989</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate on  Start Date</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="AWS Service Catalog - 1.6.7" source="x_126749_aws_sc">f0b117a3db32320093a7d7a0cf961912</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AWS Service Catalog - 1.6.7">f0b117a3db32320093a7d7a0cf961912</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_ef9ee169dba833008adbab7dca961989</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-04-07 15:02:41</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set display_value="AWS Service Catalog Variables">e5d4a8d0dba90300a5d3ddd0cf961945</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:6b05d036db1033008adbab7dca961963</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Compare Termination Time</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		
		return;
	}
	if(newValue!=oldValue){
		
		var start_time= g_form.getValue('provisioning_start_time');
		var end_time= g_form.getValue('termination_time');
		var start_date = g_form.getValue('provisioning_start_date');
		var end_date = g_form.getValue('termination_date');
		//alert("outside working" + start_time +" "+ end_time );
		
		if(start_date == end_date){
			if(start_time > end_time){
				g_form.addErrorMessage("Termination time cannot be less than Provisioning-start time, please insert correct value.");
				g_form.clearValue('termination_time');
			}
			
			else if(start_time == end_time){
				g_form.addErrorMessage("Termination time cannot be equal to Provisioning-start time, please insert correct value.");
				g_form.clearValue('termination_time');
			}
			
			else{
				return true;
			}
		}
		
		
		
		/*	var ga= new GlideAjax("ValidateScheduleTime");
		ga.addParam("sysparm_name","CompareTime");
		
		ga.addParam("sysparm_start_time",g_form.getValue('provisioning_start_time'));
		ga.addParam("sysparm_end_time",g_form.getValue('termination_time'));
		//ga.addParam("sysparm_termination_date",g_form.getValue('termination_date'));
		//ga.addParam("sysparm_start_date",g_form.getValue('provisioning_start_date'));
		//------//
		ga.getXML(setSubmit);*/
		
	}
	/*function setSubmit(response){
		
		var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		
		alert(answer);
		
		if(answer=="inValidTime"){
			alert("if working" + answer);
			g_form.addErrorMessage("please check the time selected again");
			
			//	g_form.clearValue('provisioning_start_date');
			//g_form.clearValue('termination_date');
			return false;
		}
		//-------------------//
	}*/
	
	
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-04-07 17:44:06</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>5fa00a2fdba873008adbab7dca961977</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Compare Termination Time</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="AWS Service Catalog - 1.6.7" source="x_126749_aws_sc">f0b117a3db32320093a7d7a0cf961912</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AWS Service Catalog - 1.6.7">f0b117a3db32320093a7d7a0cf961912</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_5fa00a2fdba873008adbab7dca961977</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-04-09 10:34:14</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set display_value="AWS Service Catalog Variables">e5d4a8d0dba90300a5d3ddd0cf961945</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

	// Add your code here
	
	var chg= new GlideRecord('change_request');
	chg.addQuery('parent',current.sys_id);
	chg.query();
	if(chg.next()){
	chg.cmdb_ci=current.configuration_item;
	chg.update();
	}
	

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-03-18 17:46:50</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>92f10bc9db14f3008adbab7dca9619aa</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update the CI change Request</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="AWS Service Catalog - 1.6.7" source="x_126749_aws_sc">f0b117a3db32320093a7d7a0cf961912</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AWS Service Catalog - 1.6.7">f0b117a3db32320093a7d7a0cf961912</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_92f10bc9db14f3008adbab7dca9619aa</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-19 13:57:01</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=92f10bc9db14f3008adbab7dca9619aa"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_e87f5da3db8cf3008adbab7dca9619a7
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Validate on Name</name><order/><script><![CDATA[
function onSubmit() {
	
	if (g_form.getValue('submitted') == 'yes') // this prevents recursion
		
	return true;
	
	
	
	
	var ga = new GlideAjax('ValidateScheduleTime');
	
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'ValidateName');
	
	ga.addParam('sysparm_ci_name', g_form.getValue('ProvisionedProductName'));
	
	// ga.addParam('sysparm_id', g_form.getValue('sysparm_item_guid')); //don't use getUniqueValue, it's bogus if there is an attachment and this hasn't been submitted
	
	ga.getXMLAnswer(function(response) {
		
		g_form.clearMessages();
		
		if (response == 'exist')
			
		g_form.addErrorMessage('Name already exists in provisoing record table'); // no need to do anything else, false was already returned
		
		else {
			
			g_form.setValue('submitted', 'yes'); // set the hidden value to prevent recursion
			
			g_form.getControl('order_now').click(); // use HTMLElement to grab the button, then use click()
			
		}
		
	});
	
	return false;
	
}







]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-03-13 18:58:04</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>e87f5da3db8cf3008adbab7dca9619a7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate on Name</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="AWS Service Catalog - 1.6.7" source="x_126749_aws_sc">f0b117a3db32320093a7d7a0cf961912</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AWS Service Catalog - 1.6.7">f0b117a3db32320093a7d7a0cf961912</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_e87f5da3db8cf3008adbab7dca9619a7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-04-01 17:36:19</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set display_value="AWS Service Catalog Variables">e5d4a8d0dba90300a5d3ddd0cf961945</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:d8dbe096db0c33008adbab7dca96194c</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Validate on dates</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		return;
	}
	if(newValue!=oldValue){
		//alert("outside");
		
		var ga= new GlideAjax("ValidateScheduleTime");
		ga.addParam("sysparm_name","ValidateDates");
		
		ga.addParam("sysparm_start_time",g_form.getValue('provisioning_start_time'));
		ga.addParam("sysparm_end_time",g_form.getValue('daily_termination_time'));
		ga.addParam("sysparm_termination_date",g_form.getValue('termination_date'));
		ga.addParam("sysparm_start_date",g_form.getValue('provisioning_start_date')); //------//
		ga.getXML(setSubmit);
		
	}
	function setSubmit(response){
		
		var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		alert(answer);
		if(answer=="samedate"){
			//alert("if working");
			g_form.addErrorMessage("Terimnation date should be greater than Today's date");
			
			g_form.clearValue('termination_date');
			return false;
		}
		//---------------------//
		// 		if(answer=="notValid"){
			
			// 				g_form.addErrorMessage("Provisioning Start date should be greater than or equal to  Today's date");
			
			// 			g_form.clearValue('provisioning_start_date');
			// 					return false;
			// 				}
			//-------------------//
		}
	}
	/*else if(answer=="notdo"){
		
		alert("Provisioning Start time sould be less than Termination end time ");
		return false;
		
	}*/
	
	
	
	
	]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-03-12 19:23:15</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>28dd9cd3db80f3008adbab7dca9619aa</sys_id><sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate on dates</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="AWS Service Catalog - 1.6.7" source="x_126749_aws_sc">f0b117a3db32320093a7d7a0cf961912</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AWS Service Catalog - 1.6.7">f0b117a3db32320093a7d7a0cf961912</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_28dd9cd3db80f3008adbab7dca9619aa</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-04-01 17:35:56</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set display_value="AWS Service Catalog Variables">e5d4a8d0dba90300a5d3ddd0cf961945</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_5bdf44e0dbd873008adbab7dca961905
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_126749_aws_sc.team</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>team</name><script><![CDATA[var team = Class.create();
team.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
members: function(){
	
	
var groupsArray=[];
	
	var groups= new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
	groups.addQuery('user',gs.getUserID());
	groups.query();
	while(groups.next()){
		
		groupsArray.push(groups.group +"");
		
	}



	var teamMember = [];
var member = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');

	member.addQuery('group','IN', groupsArray);
 	member.query();
	while(member.next()){
		teamMember.push(member.user.name + "");
	}	
	//gs.addInfoMessage('Team Members ' + teamMember.toString()  );

var uniTeamMember = new global.ArrayUtil().unique(teamMember);

 return uniTeamMember;


	//gs.info(groupsArray);
	
},
    type: 'team'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-03-16 15:31:24</sys_created_on><sys_id>5bdf44e0dbd873008adbab7dca961905</sys_id><sys_mod_count>19</sys_mod_count><sys_name>team</sys_name><sys_package display_value="AWS Service Catalog - 1.6.7" source="x_126749_aws_sc">f0b117a3db32320093a7d7a0cf961912</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="AWS Service Catalog - 1.6.7">f0b117a3db32320093a7d7a0cf961912</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5bdf44e0dbd873008adbab7dca961905</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-19 14:08:50</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>change_request</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="change_request">cmdb_ciISNOTEMPTY^parentISNOTEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="cmdb_ci" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="parent" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Update Change Request in event</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
	//gs.addInfoMessage("tesintg");
	var event= new GlideRecord('x_126749_aws_sc_pp_event');
	event.addQuery('awsproduct',current.cmdb_ci);
	event.addNullQuery('change_request');
	event.addQuery('awsrecordtype','PROVISION_PRODUCT');
	event.query();
	if(event.next()){
		

		
	event.change_request=current.sys_id;
	event.update();
		
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-03-18 17:51:28</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>62a28fc9db14f3008adbab7dca9619d4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Change Request in event</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="AWS Service Catalog - 1.6.7" source="x_126749_aws_sc">f0b117a3db32320093a7d7a0cf961912</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AWS Service Catalog - 1.6.7">f0b117a3db32320093a7d7a0cf961912</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_62a28fc9db14f3008adbab7dca9619d4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-19 13:56:56</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=62a28fc9db14f3008adbab7dca9619d4"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_df2e8ea3dbe873008adbab7dca9619c3
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:409ea4d6db0c33008adbab7dca961943</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Compare Start Time</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		
		return;
	}
	if(newValue!=oldValue){
		
		var start_time= g_form.getValue('provisioning_start_time');
		var end_time= g_form.getValue('termination_time');
		var one_time = g_form.getValue('one_time_termination');
		var start_date = g_form.getValue('provisioning_start_date');
		var end_date = g_form.getValue('termination_date');
		
		if (one_time == "true" && start_date == end_date){
			//alert("Time" + start_time +" "+ end_time );
			if(start_time > end_time){
				//g_form.addErrorMessage("Termination time cannot be less than Provisioning-start time, please insert correct value.");
				g_form.clearValue('termination_time');
			}
			
			else if(start_time == end_time){
				g_form.addErrorMessage("Termination time cannot be equal to Provisioning-start time, please insert correct value.");
				g_form.clearValue('termination_time');
			}
			
			else{
				return true;
			}
			
		}
		
		
	
		
	}
	
	
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-04-07 18:38:37</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>df2e8ea3dbe873008adbab7dca9619c3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Compare Start Time</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="AWS Service Catalog - 1.6.7" source="x_126749_aws_sc">f0b117a3db32320093a7d7a0cf961912</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AWS Service Catalog - 1.6.7">f0b117a3db32320093a7d7a0cf961912</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_df2e8ea3dbe873008adbab7dca9619c3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-04-09 11:33:47</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set display_value="AWS Service Catalog Variables">e5d4a8d0dba90300a5d3ddd0cf961945</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_0c60de67dbe873008adbab7dca9619e4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:96a2ae51dbe033008adbab7dca961912</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Validation on Start Date</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		return;
	}
	
	//Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	
	var start = g_form.getValue('provisioning_start_date');
	var end = g_form.getValue('termination_date');
	var schedule = g_form.getValue('scheduled_provisioning');
	var one_time = g_form.getValue('one_time_termination');
	
	
	
	if(end != ""){
		if(schedule == "true"){
			
			if(start>end){
				g_form.addErrorMessage("Provisioning Start Date cannot be greater than termination date");
				g_form.clearValue('provisioning_start_date');
			}
			else if(start == end){
				g_form.addErrorMessage("For scheduled provisioning the provisioning start date cannot be equal to termination date");
				g_form.clearValue('provisioning_start_date');
			}
			else{
				return true;
			}
		}
		
		else if(one_time == "true"){
			if(start>end){
				g_form.addErrorMessage("Provisioning start date cannot be greater than termination date");
				g_form.clearValue('provisioning_start_date');
			}
			else{
				return true;
			}
		}
		else{
			return true;
		}
		
	}
	else{return true;}
		
		
		
	}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-04-07 18:50:56</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>0c60de67dbe873008adbab7dca9619e4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>20</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validation on Start Date</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="AWS Service Catalog - 1.6.7" source="x_126749_aws_sc">f0b117a3db32320093a7d7a0cf961912</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AWS Service Catalog - 1.6.7">f0b117a3db32320093a7d7a0cf961912</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_0c60de67dbe873008adbab7dca9619e4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-04-08 12:04:41</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set display_value="AWS Service Catalog Variables">e5d4a8d0dba90300a5d3ddd0cf961945</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update><sys_documentation element="u_action" label="Action" language="en" table="var__m_var_dictionary_a350655adb8c33008adbab7dca961904"><sys_documentation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><element>u_action</element><help/><hint/><label>Action</label><language>en</language><name>var__m_var_dictionary_a350655adb8c33008adbab7dca961904</name><plural>Action</plural><sys_class_name>sys_documentation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-03-09 21:34:40</sys_created_on><sys_id>e350a95adb8c33008adbab7dca96196e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Action</sys_name><sys_package display_value="AWS Service Catalog - 1.6.7" source="x_126749_aws_sc">f0b117a3db32320093a7d7a0cf961912</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AWS Service Catalog - 1.6.7">f0b117a3db32320093a7d7a0cf961912</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_documentation_var__m_var_dictionary_a350655adb8c33008adbab7dca961904_u_action_en</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-09 21:34:40</sys_updated_on><url/><url_target/></sys_documentation></sys_documentation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_57254f3ddb04bb00b5a1f5861d9619b3
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_126749_aws_sc.ProvisionedProductAction_V2</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>ProvisionedProductAction_V2</name><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Create an instance.
 * @classdesc Execute actions on provisioned products. Actions are designed to work with
 * scripts in the "Execute Provisioned Product Action" workflow, but can be called from
 * elsewhere too.
 * @class AbstractAction
 * @param product {ProvisionedProduct} A provisioned product instance.
 */

// Note these objects are not defined in an anonymous function because
// doing so triggers cross-scope errors in ServiceNow v. Istanbul.

var AbstractAction = Class.create();
AbstractAction.prototype.type = 'AbstractAction';

/**
 * @param provisionedProduct {ProvisionedProduct}
 * @param action {String}
 * @param [recordType] {String}
 */
AbstractAction.prototype.initialize = function (provisionedProduct, action, recordType) {
    this._pp = Util.assertExists(provisionedProduct, "provisionedProduct");
    this._action = Util.assertExists(action, "action");
    this._recordType = recordType || "UNKNOWN";
};

AbstractAction.prototype.canRetry = function canRetry(response) {
    return response.deserialize().__type === 'ThrottlingException' ||
        response.getStatusCode() >= 500;
};

AbstractAction.prototype.createChangeRequest = function createChangeRequest() {
    throw new Error("Subclass must implement");
};

/**
 * Invoke the action.
 *
 * @param event {GlideRecord} Record for the provisioned product event.
 * @param parameters {Object} Object containing parameters for the request as defined in
 * the AWS API specification.
 * @param token {string} Idempotency token to identify the request.
 * @param lastAttempt {boolean} Indicates that this is the last attempt the caller will make
 * to invoke this action.
 *
 * @memberOf! UpdateAction#
 * @alias invoke
 * @see https://docs.aws.amazon.com/servicecatalog/latest/dg/API_UpdateProvisionedProduct.html.
 */
AbstractAction.prototype.invoke = function (event, parameters, token, lastAttempt) {
    throw new Error("Subclass must implement");
};

AbstractAction.prototype.isEnabled = function () {
    return true;
};

/**
 * Check that this action is permitted to the current user.
 * @return {boolean} True if the current user is the owner of the provisioned product
 *   or if they have the portfolio manager role.
 */
AbstractAction.prototype.isPermitted = function isPermitted() {
    return this._pp.isOwnedBy(gs.getUserID()) || Util.isCurrentUserPortfolioManager();
};

/**
 * Start the flow of execution for an action on a provisioned product:
 * create a change request, create a placeholder event and start the workflow to
 * invoke it.
 */
AbstractAction.prototype.request = function request(parameters) {
    var workflow = this._validateWorkflow();
    parameters = parameters || {};
    this.validateParameters(parameters);

    // Check whether a different value for the deprecated terminate change request property.
    // has been configured. If yes, that change request will handle the termination of the product.
    if (this._action === 'terminate') {
        var prop = gs.getProperty(C.sysprop.terminateChangeRequestType);
        if (prop && prop !== 'AwsProductTermination') {
            gs.info("Using change request configured by system property " + C.sysprop.terminateChangeRequestType +
                " to terminate " + this._pp.getName());
            this._pp.createTerminationChangeRequest();
            return;
        }
    }

    var changeRequest = this.createChangeRequest(parameters);
    gs.info("Created change request for " + this._action + " on " + this._pp.getName() + ": " + changeRequest.sys_id.toString());
    var event = this._initEvent(changeRequest);
    var context = this._startWorkflow(workflow, event, parameters);
    gs.debug("Started workflow context " + context + " for action " + this._action + " on " + this._pp.getName());
};

AbstractAction.prototype.validateParameters = function () {
};

/**
 * @returns {GlideRecord} The Workflow that has been configured for this action.
 * @throws If no workflow can be loaded for the action.
 */
AbstractAction.prototype._validateWorkflow = function validateWorkflow() {
    var wfOverride = C.sysprop.workflow.forAction(this._action),
        wfDefault = C.sysprop.workflow.executeAction,
        workflow = Util.getWorkflow(wfOverride);
    if (!workflow) {
        workflow = Util.getWorkflow(wfDefault);
    }
    if (!workflow) {
        throw new Error('No valid workflow is configured in properties ' + wfOverride + ' and ' + wfDefault);
    }
    return workflow;
};

/**
 * Create an event record to represent a pending operation, such as update, on a
 * provisioned product.
 *
 * @see https://docs.aws.amazon.com/servicecatalog/latest/dg/API_RecordDetail.html
 */
AbstractAction.prototype._initEvent = function initEvent(changeTask) {
    var ppe = new GlideRecord('x_126749_aws_sc_pp_event');
    ppe.initialize();
    ppe.awsproduct = this._pp.gr().sys_id.toString();
    ppe.awsrecordtype = this._recordType;
    if (changeTask) {
        //ppe.change_request = changeTask.sys_id;
		ppe.change_task = changeTask.sys_id;
    }
    ppe.insert();
    return ppe;
};

AbstractAction.prototype._startWorkflow = function startWorkflow(workflow, event, parameters) {
    var workflowParams = {
        'u_action': this._action,
        'u_params': JSON.stringify(parameters)
    };
    var handler = Util.getWorkflowHandler();
    return handler.startFlow(workflow.sys_id.toString(), event, event.operation(), workflowParams);
};


// ===== TERMINATE =============================================

var TerminateAction = Class.create();
TerminateAction.prototype = Object.create(AbstractAction.prototype);
TerminateAction.prototype.type = 'TerminateAction';

TerminateAction.prototype.initialize = function initialize(product) {
    AbstractAction.prototype.initialize.call(this, product, 'terminate', 'TERMINATE_PROVISIONED_PRODUCT');
};

TerminateAction.prototype.createChangeRequest = function (parameters) {
    var type = gs.getProperty(C.sysprop.changeRequestType) || 'AWSProvisionedProductEvent';
    var cr = new GlideRecord('change_task');
    cr.initialize();
    //cr.category = "AWS Service Catalog Product";
    cr.short_description = "Terminate " + this._pp.getName();
    cr.cmdb_ci = this._pp.gr().sys_id;
    //cr.type = type;
    cr.insert();
    return cr;
};

TerminateAction.prototype.invoke = function (event, parameters, token, lastAttempt) {
    var product = this._pp;
    if (product.gr().awsid.nil() || product.gr().awsid.toString().trim() === "") {
        var noId = "product.awsid is unset";
        gs.warn("Unable to terminate " + product.getName() + ": " + noId);
        return this._completeFailedTerminate(noId, lastAttempt);
    }

    var cred = product.getCredentialSupplier();
    if (!cred.isValid()) {
        var noCreds = "Could not establish credentials (" + cred.getErrorMessage() + ")";
        gs.warn("Unable to terminate " + product.getName() + ": " + noCreds);
        return this._completeFailedTerminate(noCreds, lastAttempt);
    }

    var ppID = product.gr().awsid.toString(),
        sc = product._getServiceCatalog(product.getRegion(), cred),
        response = sc.terminateProvisionedProduct(ppID, token);

    if (response.haveError()) {
        gs.warn("Unable to terminate " + product.getName() + "(" + ppID + "): " + response.getErrorMessage());
        return this._completeFailedTerminate(response.getErrorMessage(), lastAttempt, response);
    }

    var recordDetail = Util.assertExists(response.deserialize().RecordDetail, "RecordDetail");
    ProvisionedProductRepo.updateWithStatus(product.gr(), ProvisionedProduct.Status.terminating, "");
    ProvisionedProductRepo.updateProvisionedProductEvent(recordDetail, event);
    return {success: true};
};

TerminateAction.prototype._completeFailedTerminate = function completeFailedTerminate(reason, lastAttempt, response) {
    var status = this._pp.gr().awsstatusmessage.nil()
        ? ""
        : this._pp.gr().awsstatusmessage.toString();
    var message = status.includes("Cannot terminate:")
        ? status
        : "Cannot terminate: " + reason + ". Original status: " + status;
    // Set the provisioned product to error if terminate has failed.
    if (lastAttempt) {
        ProvisionedProductRepo.updateWithStatus(this._pp.gr(), ProvisionedProduct.Status.error, message);
    }
    return {
        success: false,
        canRetry: response && this.canRetry(response),
        message: message
    };
};

TerminateAction.prototype.isEnabled = function isEnabled() {
    var p = this._pp.gr();
    // noinspection EqualityComparisonWithCoercionJS
    var provisionedOrError = (
        p.awsstatus === "ERROR" ||
        p.awsproductstatus == ProvisionedProduct.Status.provisioned ||
        p.awsproductstatus == ProvisionedProduct.Status.error);
    return provisionedOrError && !p.awsidentity.nil() && !p.awsid.nil();
};

// ===== UPDATE ================================================

var UpdateAction = Class.create();
UpdateAction.prototype = Object.create(AbstractAction.prototype);
UpdateAction.prototype.type = 'UpdateAction';

UpdateAction.prototype.initialize = function initialize(product) {
    AbstractAction.prototype.initialize.call(this, product, 'update', 'UPDATE_PROVISIONED_PRODUCT');
};

UpdateAction.prototype.validateParameters = function validateParameters(parameters) {
    Util.assertExists(parameters.PathId, "Parameter PathId not set");
    Util.assertExists(parameters.ProvisioningArtifactId, "Parameter ProvisioningArtifactId not set");
    if (!Array.isArray(parameters.ProvisioningParameters)) {
        throw new Error("Parameter ProvisioningParameters not set");
    }
};

UpdateAction.prototype.createChangeRequest = function (parameters) {
    var type = gs.getProperty(C.sysprop.changeRequestType) || 'AWSProvisionedProductEvent';
    var cr = new GlideRecord('change_request');
    cr.initialize();
    cr.category = "AWS Service Catalog Product";
    cr.short_description = "Update " + this._pp.getName();
    cr.description = "Set:\n" +
        "* Launch path: " + parameters.PathId + "\n" +
        "* Provisioning artifact: " + parameters.ProvisioningArtifactId;
    cr.cmdb_ci = this._pp.gr().sys_id;
    cr.type = type;
    cr.insert();
    return cr;
};

UpdateAction.prototype.invoke = function update(event, params, token, lastAttempt) {
    var cred = this._pp.getCredentialSupplier();
    if (!cred.isValid()) {
        var noCreds = "Could not establish credentials (" + cred.getErrorMessage() + ")";
        gs.warn("Unable to update " + this._pp.getName() + ": " + noCreds);
        return {'success': false, message: noCreds};
    }

    gs.info("Requesting update of " + this._pp.getName());
    var sc = this._pp._getServiceCatalog(this._pp.getRegion(), cred);
    var response = sc.updateProvisionedProduct(
        this._pp.getId(),
        this._pp.getProductId(),
        params.PathId,
        params.ProvisioningArtifactId,
        params.ProvisioningParameters,
        token);

    var body = response.deserialize();
    if (!response.haveError()) {
        var recordDetail = Util.assertExists(body.RecordDetail, "RecordDetail");
        ProvisionedProductRepo.updateProvisionedProductEvent(
            recordDetail, event);
        ProvisionedProductRepo.updateProvisionedProduct(
            recordDetail, this._pp.gr(), this._pp.gr().awsidentity.toString(), ProvisionedProduct.Status.provisioning);
        return {success: true};
    } else {
        return {
            success: false,
            canRetry: this.canRetry(response),
            message: body.message
        };
    }
};

UpdateAction.prototype.isEnabled = function isEnabled() {
    var p = this._pp.gr();
    return !p.awsidentity.nil() && !p.awsid.nil() &&
        p.awsproductstatus == ProvisionedProduct.Status.provisioned &&
        (p.awsstatus.toString() === "AVAILABLE" ||
            p.awsstatus.toString() === "TAINTED");
};


// ===== SERVICE ACTION ========================================================

var ExecuteServiceActionAction = Class.create();
ExecuteServiceActionAction.prototype = Object.create(AbstractAction.prototype);
ExecuteServiceActionAction.prototype.type = 'ExecuteServiceActionAction';

ExecuteServiceActionAction.prototype.initialize = function initialize(product) {
    AbstractAction.prototype.initialize.call(this, product, 'executeServiceAction', 'EXECUTE_PROVISIONED_PRODUCT_ACTION');
};

ExecuteServiceActionAction.prototype.validateParameters = function validateParameters(parameters) {
    Util.assertExists(parameters.ServiceActionId, "Service Action ID not set");
    Util.assertExists(parameters.ServiceActionName, "Service Action name not set");
    Util.assertExists(parameters.ServiceActionDescription, "Service Action description not set");
};

ExecuteServiceActionAction.prototype.createChangeRequest = function (parameters) {
    var type = gs.getProperty(C.sysprop.changeRequestType) || 'AWSProvisionedProductEvent';
    var cr = new GlideRecord('change_request');
    cr.initialize();
    cr.category = "AWS Service Catalog Product";
    cr.short_description = "Execute provisioned product action " + parameters.ServiceActionId + " for " + this._pp.getName();
    cr.description = "Set:\n" +
        "* Service Action ID: " + parameters.ServiceActionId + "\n" +
        "* Service Action name: " + parameters.ServiceActionName + "\n" +
        "* Service Action description: " + parameters.ServiceActionDescription;
    cr.cmdb_ci = this._pp.gr().sys_id;
    cr.type = type;
    cr.insert();
    return cr;
};

ExecuteServiceActionAction.prototype.invoke = function invoke(event, params, token, lastAttempt) {
    var cred = this._pp.getCredentialSupplier();
    if (!cred.isValid()) {
        var noCreds = "Could not establish credentials (" + cred.getErrorMessage() + ")";
        gs.warn("Unable to execute service action on " + this._pp.getName() + ": " + noCreds);
        return {'success': false, message: noCreds};
    }

    gs.info("Executing provisioned product action " + params.ServiceActionId + " for " + this._pp.getName());
    var sc = this._pp._getServiceCatalog(this._pp.getRegion(), cred);

    var response = sc.executeProvisionedProductServiceAction(
        this._pp.getId(),
        params.ServiceActionId,
        token);
    var body = response.deserialize();
    if (!response.haveError()) {
        var recordDetail = Util.assertExists(body.RecordDetail, "RecordDetail");
        ProvisionedProductRepo.updateProvisionedProductEvent(
            recordDetail, event);
        ProvisionedProductRepo.updateProvisionedProduct(
            recordDetail, this._pp.gr(), this._pp.gr().awsidentity.toString(), ProvisionedProduct.Status.provisioning);
        return {success: true};
    } else {
        return {
            success: false,
            canRetry: this.canRetry(response),
            message: body.Message
        };
    }
};

ExecuteServiceActionAction.prototype.isEnabled = function isEnabled() {
    var p = this._pp.gr();
    return !p.awsidentity.nil() && !p.awsid.nil() &&
        p.awsproductstatus == ProvisionedProduct.Status.provisioned &&
        (p.awsstatus.toString() === "AVAILABLE" ||
            p.awsstatus.toString() === "TAINTED");
};

var ProvisionedProductAction_V2 = {
    terminate: function (pp) {
        return new TerminateAction(pp);
    },
    update: function (pp) {
        return new UpdateAction(pp);
    },
    executeServiceAction: function (pp) {
        return new ExecuteServiceActionAction(pp);
    }
};
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>mahmed</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-03-08 15:54:56</sys_created_on><sys_id>57254f3ddb04bb00b5a1f5861d9619b3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ProvisionedProductAction_V2</sys_name><sys_package display_value="AWS Service Catalog - 1.6.7" source="x_126749_aws_sc">f0b117a3db32320093a7d7a0cf961912</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AWS Service Catalog - 1.6.7">f0b117a3db32320093a7d7a0cf961912</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_57254f3ddb04bb00b5a1f5861d9619b3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-19 14:08:56</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_126749_aws_sc.ValidateScheduleTime</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>ValidateScheduleTime</name><script><![CDATA[var ValidateScheduleTime = Class.create();
ValidateScheduleTime.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	ValidateDates: function(){
		
		try
		{
			var flag1="do";
			
			var schedulestarttime=this.getParameter("sysparm_start_time")+"";
			var scheduleendtime=this.getParameter('sysparm_end_time')+"" ;
			var terminationdate=this.getParameter('sysparm_termination_date') ;
			var startdate=this.getParameter('sysparm_start_date') ; //-------//
			
			var gdt1 = new GlideDate().getDisplayValue();
			var gdt2 = new GlideDateTime(terminationdate);
			var gdt3 = gdt2.getDate();
			var gdt_start = new GlideDateTime(startdate);//-----//
			var gdt4 = gdt_start.getDate();//-----//
			
			
			
			if(gdt3 <= gdt1){
				
				flag1="samedate";
				return flag1;
			}
			
			return flag1;
		}
		catch(e){
			
			gs.info("error message" + e.message);
		}
	},
	
	
	
	ValidateStartDate: function(){
		
		try
		{
			var flag2="do";
			
			var schedulestarttime=this.getParameter("sysparm_start_time")+"";
			var scheduleendtime=this.getParameter('sysparm_end_time')+"" ;
			var terminationdate=this.getParameter('sysparm_termination_date') ;
			var startdate=this.getParameter('sysparm_start_date') ; //-------//
			
			var gdt1 = new GlideDate().getDisplayValue();
			var gdt_start = new GlideDateTime(startdate);//-----//
			var gdt4 = gdt_start.getDate();//-----//
			
			if(gdt4 < gdt1){
				flag2="notValid";
			}
			
			return flag2;
		}
		catch(e){
			
			gs.info("error message" + e.message);
		}
	},
	
	
	CompareDate: function(){
		
		try
		{
			var flag3="do";
			
			var schedulestarttime=this.getParameter("sysparm_start_time")+"";
			var scheduleendtime=this.getParameter('sysparm_end_time')+"" ;
			var terminationdate=this.getParameter('sysparm_termination_date') ;
			var startdate=this.getParameter('sysparm_start_date') ; //-------//
			
			var gdt1 = new GlideDate().getDisplayValue();
			var gdt2 = new GlideDateTime(terminationdate);
			var gdt3 = gdt2.getDate();
			var gdt_start = new GlideDateTime(startdate);//-----//
			var gdt4 = gdt_start.getDate();//-----//
			
			if(gdt4 > gdt3){
				flag3="inValid";
			}
			
			return flag3;
		}
		catch(e){
			
			gs.info("error message" + e.message);
		}
	},
	
	
	
	
	ValidateName: function(){
		
		var ci="notexist";
		var name=this.getParameter("sysparm_ci_name")+"";
		gs.info("my aws name" + name);
		var gr1= new GlideRecord('x_126749_aws_sc_cmdb_ci_pp');
		if(gr1.get('awsname',name)){
			ci="exist";
		}
		return ci;
		
	},
	
	
	type: 'ValidateScheduleTime'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-03-12 17:15:22</sys_created_on><sys_id>af304cdfdb00f3008adbab7dca961929</sys_id><sys_mod_count>66</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ValidateScheduleTime</sys_name><sys_package display_value="AWS Service Catalog - 1.6.7" source="x_126749_aws_sc">f0b117a3db32320093a7d7a0cf961912</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="AWS Service Catalog - 1.6.7">f0b117a3db32320093a7d7a0cf961912</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_af304cdfdb00f3008adbab7dca961929</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-04-07 18:32:46</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
